introduction: In this lab, the students will learn about the theory and working principle of different mechanical testing techniques for the evaluation of various mechanical properties. In addition, the students will learn about the conducting these experiments via this virtual lab. Furthermore, the this lab will provide the knowledge about using these testing methods to understand some phenomenon, such as precipitation strengthening, work hardening, etc.

experiments.name: Tensile Test and Stress Strain Curve of Steel
Strain Ageing and Yield Point Phenomenon in Steel
Strain and Work Hardening in Materials
Charpy and Izod Impact Testing of Materials
Creep High Temperature Test of Materials
Fatigue Cyclic Load Test of Materials
Bulk and Micro Hardness Test of Materials

objective: The virtual lab on Mechanical Metallurgy will provide insights of various mechanical testing methods to evaluate mechanical properties of materials.

courseAlignment.description: The syllabi of this lab aligns to the following universities in India.
universities: a. National Institute of Technology Warangal; MM201; B.Tech: Metallurgical And Materials Engineering
b. Veer Surendra Sai University of Technology Burla; MM 15 025; B.Tech: Metallurgical And Materials Engineering
c. Malla Reddy College of Engineering & Technology; R18A0383; B.Tech: Metallurgical And Materials Engineering
d. JadavPur University; Met/T/225; B.Tech: Metallurgical And Materials Engineering
e. JadavPur University; Met/Chem/S/22; B.Tech: Metallurgical And Materials Engineering
f. Biju Patnaik University of Technology Odisha; Professional core; B.Tech: Metallurgical And Materials Engineering
